scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && set PORT=3001&& set FRONTEND_URL=http://localhost:5173&& set GOOGLE_REDIRECT_URI=http://localhost:3001/api/auth/callback&& npm run dev
scripts.dev:backend:start: cd backend && set PORT=3001&& set FRONTEND_URL=http://localhost:5173&& set GOOGLE_REDIRECT_URI=http://localhost:3001/api/auth/callback&& npm start
scripts.dev: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Start-Job { cd backend; $env:PORT='3001'; $env:FRONTEND_URL='http://localhost:5173'; $env:GOOGLE_REDIRECT_URI='http://localhost:3001/api/auth/callback'; npm run dev } | Out-Null; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; cd frontend; npm run dev"
